pricing.title: We offer our exclusive plans at a reasonable price
pricing.subtitle: Ideal for individuals and small businesses, our Basic Service Level offers essential support and features at an affordable price. Enjoy reliable access to our core services.

free.name: Free Plan
free.description: Start for free with limited features for basic use and trial.
features: Register and open an account
Create a personal profile with up to 6 posts only
Communicate with non-friends 5 times per month (such as agents, doctors, clubs, coaches, or other players)
No access to see who viewed your profile
No access to AI video analysis
Post videos and photos in standard quality

pro.name: Pro Account
pro.description: Professional features for serious users with better experience and higher quality.
features: Register and open an account
Create a personal profile with up to 15 posts only
Communicate with non-friends 15 times per month (such as agents, doctors, clubs, coaches, or other players)
See who viewed your profile
AI video analysis available 10 times per month for free
Post videos and photos in high quality

pro_plus.name: Pro+ Account
pro_plus.description: For professional users who need maximum flexibility and performance.
features: Register and open an account
Create a personal profile with up to 28 posts only
Unlimited communication with non-friends per month (such as agents, doctors, clubs, coaches, or other players)
See who viewed your profile
AI video analysis available 25 times per month for free
Post videos and photos in ultra-high quality
Promote posts
Promote products

pro_mo2saat.name: Pro Mo2saat
pro_mo2saat.description: A plan designed for institutions and clubs with maximum freedom and support.
features: Register and open an account
Create an unlimited personal profile
Unlimited communication with non-friends per month (such as agents, doctors, clubs, coaches, or other players)
See who viewed your profile
AI video analysis available 35 times per month for free
Post videos and photos in ultra-high quality
Promote posts
Promote products
